name: Mice While It Lasted
description:
Can you guide the mouse through the three levels of the maze and find the ultimate cheese?!

I wanted to make a happy game to cheer myself up at this dull time of year and the Mouse in the Maze jam seemed like the perfect excuse. It's very silly. I've been wanting to make something with lots of microgames for a while. There should be more but I've rather run out of steam for now; maybe I'll add more later.

Let me know if you find any bugs. And let me know if you beat it - it shouldn't be too hard as I can beat it and I'm pretty rubbish at reaction based games. There are two difficulty levels which just give different amount of lives.

Hope you enjoy it.

Controls ... erm ... mouse.

Lots of resources used from the following:

www.pixabay.com
https://freepd.com
http://freemusicarchive.org/
https://www.reinerstilesets.de/
https://freesound.org/
https://opengameart.org
